parliamentary.service.title: Parliamentary Service
parliamentary.service.para: Chosen by the Parliament of New South Wales on 6.5.2015 under section 15 of the Constitution to represent the State in the Senate, vice the Hon. JP Faulkner (resigned) (term ends 30.6.2017).

committee.service.title: Committee Service
committee.service.para: Senate Select: National Broadband Network from 13.5.5 (Chair from 13.5.15); Health from 14.5.15.
Senate Legislative and General Purpose Standing: Economics References Committee from 14.5.15.

quals.work.pre.parliament.title: Qualifications and Occupation before entering Federal Parliament
quals.work.pre.parliament.para: Adviser to the Minister for Environment (NSW), 2002-06.
